mapper.select:
select p.id ,p.name ,p.state ,p.composition_id as compositionId ,c.name as compositionName ,p.description ,p.files ,p.num ,p.topics ,p.train_time as trainTime ,p.selfContactorName ,p.arrange_id as arrangeId ,oc.contactor_position as contactorPosition ,oc.contactor_phone as contactorPhone ,oc.contactor_name as contactorName ,o.name as orgName ,o.star as orgStar ,o.id as orgId ,o.province_id as provinceId ,o.city_id as cityId ,o.county_id as countyId ,c.name as compositionName from plan p left join org o on p.org_id = o.id left join org_contactor oc on o.id = oc.org_id left join composition c on p.composition_id = c.id where 1=1
and (o.name like '%${param}%' or oc.contactor_name like '%${param}%')
order by id desc
